data.productDisplayName: Puma Men Future Cat White Casual Shoes

brandUserProfile.bio: PUMA is the World's Fastest Sports Brand
brandUserProfile.name: PUMA

description.value:
Designed for everyday wear, the puma cat range of puma everyday sneakers embodies excitement and energy for life. The Future cat M1 comes with synthetic overlays on the sides with a textured backfoot finish. The outsoles with horizontal grips make these shoes very comfortable and durable while providing excellent grip, making it perfect for urban wear.
